abstrac: Helping you get one step closer to publication.
bio:
Lee Ann Wolff has been a full-time book editor since 2014. Prior to that, she worked in the corporate world as an executive assistant in a wide range of industries. Her degree is in Marketing, and she's certified as a story coach through Fictionary.co.

When not at her keyboard, you can find Lee Ann on the dance floor, teaching and dancing ballroom dances like Waltz, Foxtrot, and Swing, or walking her dog through the woods.

She enjoys travel, and is currently embarking on a tour of the US in a vintage 1971 Shasta LoFlyte.
MS Word is preferred so we can use Track Changes. Any level from proofreading to ESL rewrites. Any genre except porn, please.

abstrac: A wordsmith ready to turn your vision into a dream of ink and paper!
bio:
Dedicated and hardworking wordsmith longing to make your world and visions come to life. I am punctual, organized, and honest. I value communication.I am extremely creative. I am able to approach ideas and works from a different angle, as much as I can happily follow a strict guideline and style.
I hold a Bachelor's in Creative Writing with a minor in History.
I am open to all genres. I have a knack for comedy, sci-fi, fantasy, romance, YA, poetry, fiction, and surrealism. 
I am versed in short stories, novellas, and novels. 
I am also versed in screenwriting and am familiar with broadcasting standards.
I have experience in Canadian Non-Fiction and the guidelines of Canadian Journalism.
I am an animal lover and expert (including mythical). 
I am excited to work with you to make your dream a reality in ink and paper.

bio: I am a detail-oriented person with a Bachelor's Degree in Communications and a minor in Marketing. I also have a Master's Degree in Integrated Marketing Communications and a Certificate in Project Management. By day, I work at a cloud software company and do various projects involving writing, editing, proofreading, and overall content strategy and creation. Several nights a week, I am a dance teacher, choreographer, and dancer. I also assist friends and colleagues with resume building. All of these things have made me realize there are people who could use my services, and I'm glad to have a place to offer them.
